. The debate over what constitutes a valid metric centers on software metrics validation criteria.The objective of this article is to guide researchers in making sound contributions to the ﬁeld of softwareengineering metrics by providing a practical summary of the metrics validation criteria found in the academicliterature.
, Shandong University, China , Hefei University of Technology, China , National University of Singapore, Singapore
